name: Thomas Gilman
offering: Business Consulting, Financial Coaches, Networking Groups, Public Speaking
what_you_do: Hard Hat to CEO isn't just Consulting—it's a movement to transform construction business owners like you from overworked contractors to confident CEOs.

business_focus: Helping established construction business owners transform from overworked contractors to confident CEOs.
service_provided: business coaching, leadership development, operations streamlining
